channel.title: Ubuntu on Andy Bulka
channel.description: Recent content in Ubuntu on Andy Bulka

item.title: Getting wxPython apps into the Ubuntu app store
item.description: Have you ever dreamt of getting your own apps in the Ubuntu app store? Here’s how. I wanted to get my UML tool for Python, Pynsource, into the Ubuntu/Snapcraft app store for a long time. This is the story of how I made that happen. It certainly wasn’t easy. It took me a week of work, struggling with the concepts, documentation and various bugs in the tooling to finally get my app listed.
